text:
<test showSuccess="false" showBanner="false" showTrace="true" 
forceShowTrace="true">
   <classpath refid="test.classpath"/>
   <testlet>org.foo.MyTestlet<testlet/>
   <testlet>org.foo.MyOtherTestlet<testlet/>
<test/>

should be

<test showSuccess="false" showBanner="false" showTrace="true" 
forceShowTrace="true">
   <classpath refid="test.classpath"/>
   <testlet>org.foo.MyTestlet</testlet>
   <testlet>org.foo.MyOtherTestlet</testlet>
</test>
